alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 11:04AM EST until December 31 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Williams, Fulton and Defiance Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tiffin River at Stryker. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood waters begin to affect some farm buildings near Stryker and flood some secondary roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 11.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.0 feet on 04/05/2002. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
